mapper.select: select * from wf_statusworkitem where id=#{id}
select processId from wf_statusworkitem where instProcessId=#{instProcessId}
select statusId from wf_statusworkitem where instActivityId=#{instActivityId}
select userId from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instProcessId=#{instProcessId} and dwi.instActivityId=#{instActivityId}
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instProcessId=#{instProcessId} and dwi.instActivityId=#{instActivityId} and dwi.finishTime is null
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.userId=#{userId} and dwi.testMode=#{testMode} and dwi.finishTime is null and dwi.flag is null order by dwi.createTime desc
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.userId=#{userId} and dwi.testMode=#{testMode} and dwi.finishTime is not null and dwi.flag is null order by dwi.createTime desc
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instProcessId=#{instProcessId} and (dwi.flag is null or dwi.flag<>#{flag}) order by dwi.createTime
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} and (dwi.flag is null or dwi.flag<>#{flag}) order by dwi.createTime
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instActivityId=#{instActivityId}
select statusname from wf_statusworkitem dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} and dwi.createTime=(select max(dwi2.createTime) from DefWorkItem as dwi2 where dwi2.instanceId=#{instanceId})
select * from wf_statusworkitem dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} order by dwi.createTime
select * from wf_statusworkitem dwi where dwi.instProcessId=#{instProcessId} order by dwi.createTime
select * from wf_statusworkitem dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} and dwi.instProcessId is null and dwi.flag=#{flag}
select * from wf_statusworkitem dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} and dwi.statusId=#{statusId}
select instProcessId from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId}
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} and dwi.userId=#{userId} and (dwi.finishTime is null or dwi.flag='undo')
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId}
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} and dwi.flag=#{flag}
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} and dwi.statusId=#{statusId}
select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.instanceId=#{instanceId} and dwi.statusId=#{statusId} and dwi.flag=#{flag}

select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.userId=#{userId} and dwi.testMode=#{testMode} and dwi.finishTime is null and dwi.flag is null
AND dwi.startUserId=#{startUserId}
AND dwi.xmlData like '%${startUserId}%'
AND dwi.title like '%${title}%'
AND dwi.createTime>='#{createTime1}'
AND dwi.createTime<='#{createTime2}'
AND dwi.statusName like '%${statusName}%'
order by dwi.createTime desc

select * from wf_statusworkitem as dwi where dwi.userId=#{userId} and dwi.testMode=#{testMode} and dwi.finishTime is null and dwi.flag is null and dwi.finishTime is not null
AND dwi.startUserId=#{startUserId}
AND dwi.xmlData like '%${startUserId}%'
AND dwi.title like '%${title}%'
AND dwi.createTime>='#{createTime1}'
AND dwi.createTime<='#{createTime2}'
AND dwi.statusName like '%${statusName}%'
order by dwi.createTime desc
